lead_paragraph: Mark Calcavecchia became a fan favorite at Iowa's PGA Tour Champions stop last year, winning the tournament in bacon-themed pants.

headline.print_headline: John Daly's Arrival Highlights PGA Tour Champions in Iowa
headline.main: John Daly's Arrival Highlights PGA Tour Champions in Iowa
